data.title: Growing Up ... Mike Miller
data.meta_description: If you’re lucky enough to be at the Cleveland Clinic Courts when the Cavs wrap up practice, you’ll sometimes get to see them cut loose by throwing a football around the gym. The thing is: they ALL have good arms and good hands. Great athletes are great athletes. (The international guys like Andy and Delly don’t even mess with that stupid pigskin, but Cavaliers High Performance Director, Alex Moore – also a native Australian – can punt the ball, Australian Rules Football-style, as accurately as a perfect pass.)
